Package model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player has an identifying name and colour (and at any point may have a number of ammo cubes, weapon cards and powerup cards on their playboard. They also have a number of "statuses" (dead, in adrenaline, and so forth), among other attributes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private AmmoCube[] ammoCubes
      Max 3 ammo cubes of each colour: index 0-2 = red, 3-5 = blue, 6-8 = yellow.
      private Colour c
      BLACK, BLUE, GREEN, PURPLE, YELLOW are the colours of the available playable characters (whose figurines are not represented)
      private Cell cell  
      private boolean firstPlayerCard
      True means first player
      private java.lang.String nickName  
      private PlayerBoard playerBoard  
      private java.util.LinkedList<PowerUpCard> powerUpCards  
      private int score  
      private int turnFinalFrenzy
      0 if your Final Frenzy turn is before the first player, 1 if you are the first player, 2 if you play after
      private java.util.LinkedList<WeaponCard> weaponCards

        True means first player

      • score

        private int score

      • ammoCubes

        private AmmoCube[] ammoCubes
        Max 3 ammo cubes of each colour: index 0-2 = red, 3-5 = blue, 6-8 = yellow. These positions never change

      • powerUpCards

      • turnFinalFrenzy

        private int turnFinalFrenzy
        0 if your Final Frenzy turn is before the first player, 1 if you are the first player, 2 if you play after
